remarks: Slightly more general equality inference for the maps to notation. (Contributed by FL, 14-Sep-2013.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 16-Dec-2013.)
statement:
mpteq2da.1 $e |- F/ x ph $.
mpteq2da.2 $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. A ) -> B = C ) $.
mpteq2da $p |- ( ph -> ( x e. A |-> B ) = ( x e. A |-> C ) ) $.
